original_title: 僕とかおりの甘～い性活
overview: A sweet sexual activity start with Kaori every day! From the scene of meeting you, to the flirty sex time in the morning, to the lovey-dovey bedtime before going to bed, fellatio in the bath! The lovey-dovey corner is still condensed! "Let's do a lot of naughty things today♪"
title: Sweet Life of Kaori and Me Kaori Maeda
